title: safar1980
author: safar1980
content: LD4's new record in power efficiency of 0.71 W/MH represents an improvement over 0.73 W/MH for model LD3. By harnessing recent advancements in technology, LD4's peak output can reach 5GH/s, far higher than the 4800 MH/s achieved by LD3. This breakthrough in mining efficiency makes LD4 the best machine available on the market for both Litecoin and Dogecoin.https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/bit-mining-limited-announces-the-next-generation-of-litecoindogecoin-mining-ld4-301811687.htmlThis new model is noticeably more power efficient than the LD3 while also having the potential to reach 5GH/s.üëèhttps://twitter.com/BITMining_BTCM/status/1653110687269548032But the competitor Bitmain Antminer L7 (9.5Gh) has better hashrate and power efficiencyhttps://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/bitmain/antminer-l7-9-5gh–º
